mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart_tbl USING DUAL ON (u_id = #{u_id} and p_no = #{p_no}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cart_amt = cart_amt + #{cart_amt} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_no, p_no, u_id, cart_amt) VALUES (seq_cart_no.nextval, #{p_no}, #{u_id}, #{cart_amt})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM rn, c.cart_no, c.p_no, c.u_id, c.cart_amt, p.p_up_folder, p.p_img, p.p_img, p.p_px, (p.p_px * c.cart_amt) as sum FROM p_tbl p INNER JOIN cart_tbl c ON p.p_no = c.p_no WHERE c.u_id = #{u_id}
SELECT sum(p.p_px * c.cart_amt) FROM p_tbl p INNER JOIN cart_tbl c ON p.p_no = c.p_no WHERE c.u_id = #{u_id}
